Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new fabulous 2-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. Features of the home include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, casement windows, and in-wall heating and cooling units.
The home opens into a cozy living room and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a sleek white countertop, a mosaic tile backsplash, lacquer cabinetry, and a suite of stainless steel electric appliances from Blomberg, Frigidaire, LG, and Haier, including a dishwasher and a microwave. Your full bathroom has been upgraded with modern features including a beautiful, mosaic tile wall!
804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. You will be just a few minutes from Broadway and very close to Reinaldo Salgado Playground and Saratoga Park. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. The J and Z subway lines are only a few blocks away.
Schedule your private showing with us today!

No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!
